about.title: Let me tell you something about me
about.desc: I'm passionate about technology and businesses. Always learning trends and updating projects, I love innovation and creative solutions. I have the experience from +5 years working for Entrepreneurs and Local Shops using Digital Marketing to get their goals. I would like to develop webs with the newest technology for your projects. We can create uniques things, let's talk!
